Content: Hi@ I'm a game designer. We have an idea for a platform game@ could you please help us test the feasibility of the game?
Name: Designer

Content: First of all I have to tell you how to control your character@ by moving the joystick left and right you can control the character to move left and right.
Name: Designer

Content: By pressing B you can control your character's jump.
Name: Designer

Content: This is what we have in the game so far. Please enjoy the game and look forward to your feedback on the game!
Name: Designer
